item.title: Links
item.description: Companies Boston Dynamics - create exceptional robots that enrich people’s lives Google OpenAI Stability Tesla Tools Bard ChatGPT Cleanup.pictures - Remove unwanted object, defect, people or text from your pictures DALL·E 2 - Creates realistic images & art from a description in natural language Deep Nostalgia - Animate your family photos GitHub Copilot Krisp - Improves the productivity of online meetings with its AI-powered Voice Clarity and Meeting Assistant LALAL.AI - Extract vocal, accompaniment & various instruments from any audio / video Murf - Text to speech AI voice generator Notion Soundraw - Royalty-free AI generated music Speechify
item.content:encoded:

  • Murf - Text to speech AI voice generator

  • Soundraw - Royalty-free AI generated music
  • Speechify
